alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:10PM CDT until June 14 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Talladega County in east central Alabama... Calhoun County in east central Alabama... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 210 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rainbow City to near Harrisburg to near Moody, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Anniston, Oxford, Talladega, Jacksonville, Childersburg, West End-Cobb Town, Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Lincoln, Weaver, Riverside, Vincent, Munford, Ohatchee, Hobson City, Waldo, Alpine Bay Resort, Talladega Superspeedway and Alexandria. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
